edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image.io.omero

Class OmeroServerImageReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image.io.ImageReader
      • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image.io.omero.OmeroServerImageReader

  • public class OmeroServerImageReader
extends ImageReader
    An ImageReader that reads images from an OMERO server instead of files on disk.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image.io.ImageReader

    • Constructor Detail

      • OmeroServerImageReader

        public OmeroServerImageReader()
        Constructs a new OmeroServerImageReader with no specified server.

    • Method Detail

      • incrementConnections

        protected static void incrementConnections()
        Adds a connection to the count of current connections to the OMERO server. Ensures that the server is not overloaded with connection requests.

      • decrementConnections

        protected static void decrementConnections()
        Removes a connection from the count of current connections to the OMERO server. Ensures that the server is not overloaded with connection requests.

      • getNumberOfConnections

        protected static int getNumberOfConnections()
        Gets the number of current connections to the OMERO server.
        Returns:
        The current number of connections.

      • connectToServer

        protected void connectToServer(OmeroServerInfo info)
        Attempts a connection to the server at the specified address using the provided username and password. Logs any errors in connecting, but returns normally regardless of whether the connection succeeded.
        Parameters:
        info - An OmeroServerInfo object containing the hostname, usenname, and password to use for the connection.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        Closes the connection to the OMERO server.

      • readImageFromOmeroServer

        public Image readImageFromOmeroServer(long omeroserverImageId,
                             OmeroServerInfo info)
                               throws IOException
        Reads an Image with the specified Id on the OMERO server using the provided address, username, and password.
        Parameters:
        omeroserverImageId - The ID that the OMERO server as assigned to the desired image; this image will be retrieved.
        info - An OmeroServerInfo object containing the hostname, usenname, and password to use for the connection.
        Returns:
        An Image containing the data from the Image identified by ID. It is not guaranteed how much metadata, if any, will be retrieved. Null if there is a problem retrieving the Image.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a problem with the temporary disk storage for the retrieved Image.

      • getImageNameForOmeroId

        public String getImageNameForOmeroId(long omeroserverImageId,
                            OmeroServerInfo info)
                              throws IOException
        Reads the name of an Image on the OMERO server given its Id.
        Parameters:
        omeroserverImageId - The ID that the OMERO server as assigned to the desired image; this image will be retrieved.
        info - An OmeroServerInfo object containing the hostname, usenname, and password to use for the connection.
        Returns:
        A String containing the name of the Image.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the Image cannnot be accessed on the server.

      • loadImageFromOmeroServer

        public String[] loadImageFromOmeroServer(long omeroserverImageId,
                                OmeroServerInfo info)
        Asynchronously loads the Image with the specified Id on the OMERO server using the provided address, username, and password, and stores it to a temporary file on disk.
        Parameters:
        omeroserverImageId - The ID that the OMERO server as assigned to the desired image; this image will be retrieved.
        info - An OmeroServerInfo object containing the hostname, usenname, and password to use for the connection.
        Returns:
        An array containing two elements: first, the original name of the image on the OMERO server; second, the temporary filename to which the image is being stored.
